text.section:
An employee organization that is certified or that seeks certification as an exclusive representative under this subtitle shall:
file with the Commission and the Labor Commissioner a copy of the employee organization's constitution and bylaws; and
report promptly any change in the constitution or bylaws.
An employee organization shall file an annual report with the Commission and the Labor Commissioner.

The annual report shall include a financial report that:
is signed by the president and treasurer or corresponding principal officers of the employee organization; and
contains information in detail sufficient to accurately disclose the financial condition and operations of the employee organization.

An employee organization that has not filed an annual report or the constitution and bylaws of which do not conform to the requirements of subsection (b) of this section may not be or remain certified as an exclusive representative under this subtitle.
